sentences.english: I am the teeth in the darkness, the talons in the night.
sentences.chinese: 我是，黑暗的尖齒，深夜的魔爪。

sentences.english: Or the time I sent that late night email to my ex-girlfriend that we should get back together.
sentences.chinese: 或者我在深夜給前女友發郵件，希望我們能重修舊好。

sentences.english: In deep night, when on the narrow bridge the traveler trembles.
sentences.chinese: 每當深夜，浪遊者在山間小路哆嗦戰慄。

sentences.english: She worked far into the night and prepared a repot for the manager.
sentences.chinese: 她工作到深夜，爲經理準備一份報告。

sentences.english: He sat up far into the night working on the report.
sentences.chinese: 他開夜車至深夜，寫那份報告。

sentences.english: Late at night she walked alone in the street, appearing even more lonely and solitary.
sentences.chinese: 深夜，她一個人走在街頭，越發顯得身單影孤。

sentences.english: Ben had it out with his roommate about coming back home so late and making a lot of noise.
sentences.chinese: 是有深夜遲歸引起一連串噪音，班因而與他起了口角。

sentences.english: He received an urgent announcement of victory at midnight.
The night before he left, I stayed up in my room for a long time.
sentences.chinese: 在他走之前的那一晚，我在自己的房間裏熬到深夜。

sentences.english: Because of the late night in, she often cannot find him to taking nicotian olfactory finger then.
sentences.chinese: 因爲深夜裏，她經常找不到他那帶着菸草味道的手指。

sentences.english: The night deep dark blue eyes.
sentences.chinese: 深夜深巷那雙深藍色的眼睛。

sentences.english: Late returns, people find, sammo hung the dwellings of lamp incredibly still on.
sentences.chinese: 深夜返回時，大家發現，洪金寶住處的燈居然還亮着。

sentences.english: He didnt return to the dormitory until midnight.
I stayed late at the hospital with her.
sentences.chinese: 我在醫院裏陪着她直到深夜。

sentences.english: Mrs Wang reads English books on Chinese medicine at night.
sentences.chinese: 在深夜，王夫人看一些關於中醫方面的英文書籍。

definition: midnight/in the middle of the night
in the evening/when night falls/towards evening/at night fall/at dusk
time/period during the day/one of the 12 two-hour periods enumerated by the earthly branches 地支
very early in the morning/in the wee hours
in the depth of night/late at night
the whole night/all through the night
in the depth of the night/very late at night
